text: "Stand Ye Guamanians" (, ) is the anthem of Guam. == Lyrics == CHamoru lyrics IPA transcription English lyrics since 1952 Original English lyrics (as documented in 1934) I Stand ye Guamanians for your country, And sing her praise from shore to shore ğ„† For her honor, for her glory, Exalt our island forever more. ğ„‡ II May everlasting peace reign o'er us May heaven's blessing to us come ğ„† Against all perils, do not forsake us God protect our isle of Guam. ğ„‡ I Stand ye Chamorros for our country, And sing her praise from shore to shore, ğ„† For her honor, For her glory, Exalt our Island forevermore. ğ„‡ II May ever-lasting peace reign o'er us. May heaven's blessings to us come; ğ„† Against all perils, do not forsake us, God protect our Island home. ğ„‡ ==References== Category:United States state songs Category:Guam Category:Oceanian anthems
title: Stand Ye Guamanians
